title: Design shared inbox UI with email list view and team member visibility
summary: Create a unified inbox interface displaying all team emails with clear visibility of which team members are assigned or viewing each email. Interface should support efficient email scanning and team coordination.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: shared team inbox system for support/sales teams

title: Implement multi-tag system allowing multiple tags per email
summary: Develop a flexible tagging system that allows applying multiple categorization tags to each email. System must support tag combinations and efficient tag-based filtering for workflow management.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Multi-tag email categorization with rules-based automatic assignment

title: Create predefined tags for 'Urgent', 'Billing', 'Feature Request'
summary: Configure initial set of predefined tags including 'Urgent', 'Billing', and 'Feature Request' categories. These core tags will serve as the foundation for automated routing rules.

title: Build automatic assignment rules engine based on email tags
summary: Create a sophisticated rules engine that automatically assigns emails to appropriate teams based on applied tags. Engine must support complex rule combinations and priority-based routing logic.

title: Configure rule: route 'Billing' tagged emails to finance team
summary: Set up specific routing rule to automatically direct all emails tagged as 'Billing' to the finance team. This exemplifies the tag-based routing system configuration.

title: Implement manual email reassignment functionality
summary: Enable team members to manually reassign emails between teams or individuals when automatic routing needs override. Feature must include reassignment history tracking and permission controls.

title: Add 'unassigned' status marking capability for emails
summary: Implement ability to mark emails as 'unassigned' when no team member is actively handling them. This status helps identify emails requiring attention in the workflow.

title: Develop reply collision prevention with locking mechanism
summary: Build a robust locking system that prevents multiple team members from simultaneously replying to the same email. System must implement first-come-first-served conflict resolution with automatic lock release.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Collision prevention for simultaneous replies with locking/warning mechanisms

title: Create warning system for simultaneous reply drafting attempts
summary: Implement real-time warning notifications when team members attempt to draft replies to emails already being handled. Warnings should display current handler information and provide override options.

title: Implement 'handled' status marking upon reply completion
summary: Automatically mark emails as 'handled' when a team member successfully completes and sends a reply. This status change should trigger workflow updates and reporting metrics.

title: Build notification system for team members on email status changes
summary: Implement real-time notification system to alert team members when email status changes (assigned, reassigned, marked handled). Support multiple notification channels including in-app, email, and webhooks for integration with external tools.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: notification system for team members on email status changes

title: Create search/filter interface by tag, assignment, and status
summary: Design and implement advanced search interface allowing users to filter emails by multiple criteria including tags, assignment status, team member, and handling status. Include saved search functionality and export capabilities for filtered results.

title: Generate response time reports grouped by tags and teams
summary: Develop comprehensive reporting module to track and visualize response times grouped by tags and teams. Include metrics like average first response time, resolution time, and workload distribution across team members with exportable dashboards.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: reporting on response times and workload

title: Implement first-come-first-served conflict resolution for simultaneous assignments
summary: Build concurrency control mechanism using optimistic locking to handle simultaneous email assignments. Implement first-come-first-served policy with clear user feedback when conflicts occur, preventing duplicate work on same emails.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Collision prevention for simultaneous replies with locking/warning mechanisms

title: Create reassignment prompt when tags affecting rules are removed
summary: Implement validation system that detects when tag removal affects existing assignment rules. Prompt users to reassign emails or update rules to maintain workflow integrity when critical tags are modified or removed.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: reassignment prompt when tags affecting rules are removed

title: Integrate with IMAP, Gmail API, and Office 365 email systems
summary: Develop robust email integration layer supporting IMAP protocol, Gmail API, and Office 365 Graph API. Handle authentication, rate limiting, and error recovery while maintaining real-time synchronization with external email systems.

title: Ensure non-disruptive deployment for teams not using shared inbox
summary: Design deployment strategy with feature flags and gradual rollout to ensure teams not using shared inbox functionality remain unaffected. Include compatibility checks and fallback mechanisms to prevent any disruption to existing email workflows.

title: Document tagging and assignment logic for team onboarding
summary: Create comprehensive documentation covering tagging conventions, assignment rules, and workflow best practices. Include interactive tutorials, video guides, and quick reference materials to facilitate smooth team onboarding and adoption.
